subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Mark Wiebe shot a four-under 68 to take a three-stroke lead over Scott Hoch in the Champions Tour’s Cap Cana Championship in the Dominican Republic. Wiebe’s bogey-free round pushed him to nine-under 135.
snippet: Mark Wiebe shot a four-under 68 to take a three-stroke lead over Scott Hoch in the Champions Tour’s Cap Cana Championship in the Dominican Republic. Wiebe’s bogey-free round pushed him to nine-under 135.
